version_description: Bug fixes
Faster photo loading for My Cloud devices.

o Support for My Passport Wireless
o Completely new design
o File management enhancements
o Music playback in-app
- Bug Fixes

- Private Sharing
- Auto Backup
- Support for MyCloud and My Cloud Mirror Gen 2 devices
- Bug Fixes
- Bug Fixes

- Improved Auto Backup feature
- Added AirPlay support
- Fixed various crashes
- Bug Fixes
- Bug Fixes
- Bug Fixes

- My Passport Wireless Pro support
- Adobe Creative Cloud support
- Bug fixes

- My Passport Wireless Pro support
- Adobe Creative Cloud support
- Bug fixes
- Bug Fixes

- Added local notifications for improving Auto Backup
- Resolved Airplay Video Playback issue when App is in the background
- Playback support for MKV / FLV / AVI media using other media players
- Adobe Creative Cloud support
- Resolved Open In option failing

Improved sorting options menu to allow order by date or alphabetically
Resolved some connectivity issues for remote access and network errors
Resolved some app crash scenarios and improved stability
Supports Dropbox V2 API
Bug Fixes

-         Introducing support for My Passport Wireless SSD
-         RAW image preview support for My Passport Wireless SSD and My Passport Wireless Pro*
-         Brand new “Copy All” option makes a full copy from SD/USB storage on each import. The “Move” function has been removed*.  

Bug fixes:
-          Fixed My Passport Wireless & My Passport Wireless Pro time sync problem
-          Fixed Google Drive access error
-          Fixed My Cloud mobile app displaying NULL value from JPEG EXIF*
-          Other general bug fixes and minor software improvements
 
*New 1.04.xx firmware required for My Passport Wireless Pro
Bug Fixes

-         Introducing support for My Passport Wireless SSD
-         RAW image preview support for My Passport Wireless SSD and My Passport Wireless Pro*
-         Brand new “Copy All” option makes a full copy from SD/USB storage on each import. The “Move” function has been removed*.  

Bug fixes:
-          Fixed My Passport Wireless & My Passport Wireless Pro time sync problem
-          Fixed Google Drive access error
-          Fixed My Cloud mobile app displaying NULL value from JPEG EXIF*
-          Other general bug fixes and minor software improvements
 
*New 1.04.xx firmware required for My Passport Wireless Pro

- Added support for iPhone X
- Bug fixes

- Added FTP On/Off Switch – Easier wireless tethering setup with compatible cameras. (My Passport Wireless products only)
- Added Drive Lock On/Off Switch – Turns off the drive’s USB 3.0 port to help keep your data private. (My Passport Wireless products only)
- Resolved issues with the status bar when playing a video
- Other minor bug fixes

- Fixed screen compatibility issue with iPad Pro 11 inch
- Fixed image captured date issue with camera roll backup
- Other minor bug fixes

•Import multiple RAW images into Adobe Lightroom CC Mobile* from My Passport Wireless, with our new iOS Files integration. Visit learn.mycloud.com/#lightroom for instructions.

•With the iOS Files app, you can easily access, view, organize, copy, and drag and drop files and folders between your My Cloud, My Passport Wireless and other compatible apps. For detailed information on what is supported in this implementation of the Files app, visit support.wdc.com and knowledge base article 24579.

•This update also resolves other minor bugs.

* Requires an Adobe Lightroom CC or Adobe Creative Cloud Photography plan

- Fixed usability issue of app not maintaining browse position after playing a photo or video
- Fixed usability issue of not showing file extension when displaying file with long filename
- Other minor bug fixes

- Fixed usability issue of app not maintaining browse position after playing a photo or video
- Fixed usability issue of not showing file extension when displaying file with long filename

- Fixed image captured date issue with camera roll backup

Added option to skip device verification

Important bug fixes

What’s New in Version 3.0
• WD 2go is now WD My Cloud! We updated the name of our app to align our WD My Cloud solutions. Visit products.wd.com/MyCloud to learn more about our My Cloud personal cloud storage products.

• Google Drive support – full access to your Google Drive, including media streaming and file management

• Thumbnail support for My Cloud personal cloud storage, Google Drive, SkyDrive, Dropbox and My Net N900 Central. Note: Thumbnail support is not available for My Book Live and My Book Live Duo devices.
